creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: ant, wearing a cap and glasses and holding a pipe, standing in a doorway; grasshopper, wearing a scarf and holding a cello on its back, standing on a cobblestone path in the snow leading up to doorway
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

URC on back, in pencil: [39]
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: The Ant and the Grasshopper
